# RelevantContext.HeadphonesCondition

**Structure**

A structure that indicates whether a person’s headphones are connected.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HeadphonesCondition
```

## Conditions

- **connected**: A person’s headphones are connected to the device.

## Hardware clues

- **hardware(headphones:)**: Tells the system a widget is relevant when a person’s headphones are connected.

items.description: A person’s headphones are connected to the device.
items.name: connected

items.description: Tells the system a widget is relevant when a person’s headphones are connected.
items.name: hardware(headphones:)

title: RelevantContext.HeadphonesCondition
